name: Rise of the living beans
description:
This is a game not to be taken seriously.

Just grab a tin of baked beans and enjoy.

Warning - There may be some UI scaling issues present. This is a work in progress

DISCLAIMER - I am not associated with Heinz Beanz. I am not promoting Heinz Beanz. I am not against the character of Mr Bean or the actor Rowan Atkinson. This is just a silly game that I made.
